actions.name: AddNotificationChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to add a notification channel to DevOps Guru

actions.name: DescribeAccountHealth
actions.description: Grants permission to view the health of operations in your AWS account

actions.name: DescribeAccountOverview
actions.description: Grants permission to view the health of operations within a time range in your AWS account

actions.name: DescribeAnomaly
actions.description: Grants permission to list the details of a specified anomaly

actions.name: DescribeFeedback
actions.description: Grants permission to view the feedback details of a specified insight

actions.name: DescribeInsight
actions.description: Grants permission to list the details of a specified insight

actions.name: DescribeOrganizationHealth
actions.description: Grants permission to view the health of operations in your organization

actions.name: DescribeOrganizationOverview
actions.description: Grants permission to view the health of operations within a time range in your organization

actions.name: DescribeOrganizationResourceCollectionHealth
actions.description: Grants permission to view the health of operations for each AWS CloudFormation stack or AWS Services or accounts specified in DevOps Guru in your organization

actions.name: DescribeResourceCollectionHealth
actions.description: Grants permission to view the health of operations for each AWS CloudFormation stack specified in DevOps Guru

actions.name: DescribeServiceIntegration
actions.description: Grants permission to view the integration status of services that can be integrated with DevOps Guru

actions.name: GetCostEstimation
actions.description: Grants permission to list service resource cost estimates

actions.name: GetResourceCollection
actions.description: Grants permission to list AWS CloudFormation stacks that DevOps Guru is configured to use

actions.name: ListAnomaliesForInsight
actions.description: Grants permission to list anomalies of a given insight in your account

actions.name: ListEvents
actions.description: Grants permission to list resource events that are evaluated by DevOps Guru

actions.name: ListInsights
actions.description: Grants permission to list insights in your account

actions.name: ListNotificationChannels
actions.description: Grants permission to list notification channels configured for DevOps Guru in your account

actions.name: ListOrganizationInsights
actions.description: Grants permission to list insights in your organization

actions.name: ListRecommendations
actions.description: Grants permission to list a specified insight's recommendations

actions.name: PutFeedback
actions.description: Grants permission to submit a feedback to DevOps Guru

actions.name: RemoveNotificationChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to remove a notification channel from DevOps Guru

actions.name: SearchInsights
actions.description: Grants permission to search insights in your account

actions.name: SearchOrganizationInsights
actions.description: Grants permission to search insights in your organization

actions.name: StartCostEstimation
actions.description: Grants permission to start the creation of an estimate of the monthly cost

actions.name: UpdateResourceCollection
actions.description: Grants permission to update the list of AWS CloudFormation stacks that are used to specify which AWS resources in your account are analyzed by DevOps Guru

actions.name: UpdateServiceIntegration
actions.description: Grants permission to enable or disable a service that integrates with DevOps Guru
